title: How to Make a Pie Crust Ahead of Time

steps.headline: Mix flour, salt and sugar together.
Mix together egg, water and vinegar.
Refrigerate 30 minutes before using.
steps.description: Freeze the dough if you want to preserve it for later. You may freeze balls of dough. Don't refrigerate if freezing.

steps.headline: To thaw, take out of freezer for a couple of hours then roll out for pie.

text: Mix flour, salt and sugar together.  Blend in the butter.  Mix together egg, water and vinegar.  Add to butter mixture.  Divide into 4 portions.  Refrigerate 30 minutes before using. Freeze the dough if you want to preserve it for later. You may freeze balls of dough. Don't refrigerate if freezing. To thaw, take out of freezer for a couple of hours then roll out for pie.  Finished.
